name: Neon Cube Drop Ultra
description:
Learn by playing the game. It's pretty simple!

Scroll wheel or mouse click and drag to scroll the level select. Beat 1 out of the group of 2 levels to unlock the next 2.

Each block is worth 1 point. Chaining 2 or more sets of colours at once increases the multiplier. So matching 3 green, and 3 blue at once, gets you (3+3)*2 = 12 points.

Alt-Enter to toggle full screen.

The very bottom of the main menu has a 'Custom' button to set your own levels.
